welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Arcadia, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes, rich history, and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that Arcadia has to offer. Happy travels!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Whiteman Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal is a smaller terminal dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cable Airport offers a small waiting area and ticket counter for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Cable Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering a luxurious lounge and concierge services.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free. No password is required.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ontario International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Ontario International Airport, serving regional flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport, with no time limit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Van Nuys Airport serves as the primary hub for commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Van Nuys Airport caters to high-end and VIP travelers, offering luxurious amenities and services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Monica Airport serves commercial, private, and charter flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The north terminal at Santa Monica Airport is primarily used for private and charter flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The south terminal at Santa Monica Airport is primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Ynez Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Santa Ynez Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network.
